name: Invoice
title: Invoice
description: Invoice containing collected ChargeItems from an Account with calculated individual and total price for Billing purpose.

elements.name: Invoice
elements.description: Invoice containing collected ChargeItems from an Account with calculated individual and total price for Billing purpose.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifier of this Invoice, often used for reference in correspondence about this invoice or for tracking of payments.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of the Invoice.

elements.name: cancelledReason
elements.description: In case of Invoice cancellation a reason must be given (entered in error, superseded by corrected invoice etc.).

elements.name: type
elements.description: Type of Invoice depending on domain, realm an usage (e.g. internal/external, dental, preliminary).

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The individual or set of individuals receiving the goods and services billed in this invoice.

elements.name: recipient
elements.description: The individual or Organization responsible for balancing of this invoice.

elements.name: date
elements.description: Date/time(s) of when this Invoice was posted.

elements.name: participant
elements.description: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

elements.name: account
elements.description: Account which is supposed to be balanced with this Invoice.

elements.name: lineItem
elements.description: Each line item represents one charge for goods and services rendered. Details such as date, code and amount are found in the referenced ChargeItem resource.

elements.name: totalPriceComponent
elements.description: The total amount for the Invoice may be calculated as the sum of the line items with surcharges/deductions that apply in certain conditions.  The priceComponent element can be used to offer transparency to the recipient of the Invoice of how the total price was calculated.

elements.name: paymentTerms
elements.description: Payment details such as banking details, period of payment, deductibles, methods of payment.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Comments made about the invoice by the issuer, subject, or other participants.
